topics.body:
Heard the thread's closing down soon.
Alright, I'll play nice, and I'll pack up and leave when it's time to. 

...But I do want to see another thread like this start up some time. It'll be a nice fresh start, and (most) of us will all still be here to talk and hang out with each other, right?

Well...lemme get the train fired up, collect some coaches, and be all ready to go before it all ends...

-Arriving Soon: _The Time Wasting Thread Special_, now en route to General Discussion Station-
!https://c1.staticflickr.com/9/8049/8115402686_fabf213f66_b.jpg!
